title.rendered: One article I read about 5 things I learned about raising boys

content.rendered:
This is a “too long for a Tweet” thing so it gets a short blog.

This little article has made a real different to me and Isaac today. Makes me realise that, yes, sometimes I’m just a clown and a portable climbing frame, but being a clown and a portable climbing frame are actually REALLY IMPORTANT.

5 Things I Learned About Raising Boys (so far) – Washington Post

excerpt.rendered: This little article has made a real different to me and Isaac today.
